[NEAT-1004] 🧑‍🏫Validation of indices (#1230)

# Description

Stacked on #1241 

This introduce the validation for the cases:
* Composite indices missing order.
* Composite indices order is ambiguous.
* Indices are not consistently defined for the same container property.
* Inverted index for non-listable or btree index for listable property.
* IndexType not explicitly defined.
* Set invalid cursorable on inverted
